export function CalculateTotal(amount,term){var totalAmount;if(amount<=1000){totalAmount=amount*0.25;}else if(amount>1000&&amount<=5000){totalAmount=amount*0.2;}else if(amount>5000&&amount<=10000){totalAmount=amount*0.15;}else{totalAmount=amount*.10;}//return totalAmount;
var totalTerm;switch(term){case 3:totalTerm=amount*0.05;break;case 6:totalTerm=amount*0.1;break;case 12:totalTerm=amount*0.15;break;case 24:totalTerm=amount*0.2;break;default:break;}return amount+totalAmount+totalTerm;}
